participant_1.name: Lucas Bennett
participant_1.personality: Passionate and creative, Lucas is someone who thrives on expressing himself through performance. He is friendly and enjoys connecting with others through shared interests.
participant_1.background: I have been acting since I was ten years old. I made my first movie when I was 18. Now I am a fixture on a weekly telenovela. I am an actor.

participant_2.name: Sofia Martinez
participant_2.personality: Energetic and enthusiastic, Sofia has a deep love for music and live performances. She is sociable and enjoys sharing her experiences with others.
participant_2.background: I go to at least 10 concerts a year. Lady Gaga is my current favorite singer. I love music. I work in retail.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love going to concerts! I go to at least 10 a year.
That's awesome! I used to be in a band, so I love going to concerts too.
What kind of music did you play?
We played rock and pop. We were called The Young Bloods.
Oh, that sounds cool! I've always wanted to be in a band.
It was a lot of fun, but it was also a lot of work.
I can imagine. What did you like most about it?
I loved the feeling of performing on stage. It was so much fun to see people's reactions to our music.
I bet it was! I love that feeling too.
What's your favorite concert you've ever been to?
My favorite concert was Lady Gaga's concert last year. She was incredible!
I've heard great things about her concerts. I've always wanted to go to one.
You should! She's so much fun live.
I'll definitely check out her tour next time she's in town.
